attributes.title: I don’t have an explanation trumps just tryna ban tiktok were not goin down with the Indians
attributes.review: Why u doin this Trump we’re bringing justice tiktok is the only app that some kids watch you wanna take away a 5 year olds child hood?

attributes.title: INSUFFERABLE QUALITY!!!!!!!
attributes.review: Not only is this app full of LIES but it is also DISGUSTING. The layout is TERRIBLE and every time I tried to open the app, my phone would CRASH. Only use this app if you support racists, predators, liars, and overall HORRIBLE human beings.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.review: Worst app ever! It took 4 days to download and made my phone lag like crazy! And ended up making my phone make weird noises that ended up attracting dogs! Highly suggest not to get this app!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: If I could rate it 0 stars then I would but I can’t 🤡 the app took years to download. And once I downloaded it I remembered that he is a racist orange spaghetti container that my parents keep in the cabinet. Trump 2020 on a headstone😌

attributes.title: save us.
attributes.review: nothing but trash on here. keep in mind i voted fir this big baby in 2016. worst decision of my LIFE. i was very disappointed in what was on the app AND with how he’s leading our country. so please people. help.

attributes.title: Should burn
attributes.review: Literally every time I used this app for more than 5 minutes, my phone crashed and shut itself off. I don’t trust it.

attributes.title: Black and Hispanic lives matter!
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER AND I MEAN EVER GOT!!! Do not download this app!! You will regret it it is so hard to look for things! And Trump is the worst president anyway why would you think of downloading this app! 😂 He Finns be BIG MAD 😤😡🤬

attributes.title: No ma’am no sir
attributes.review: I tried my best 😔 this app was for Cheeto leading ruler 🤭 and yet as soon as I got the app something hit my head 🥺 now I can’t support him 😳 I believe it was a whole pound of common sense 🤡disgusting app please don’t download

attributes.title: truly disappointing ❤️
attributes.review: if i could give 0 stars i would. app took 3hrs to download, and immediately began glitching. also the propaganda literally made my head ache, the FAKE NEWS.

attributes.title: Caused my phone to get a virus :(
attributes.review: I was interested in finding a reason why to vote for Donald Trump in the upcoming election but all this app had was misinformation. This app does not make me want to vote for Trump and it gave my phone a virus. Worst app ever.
